author: travelandtourworld.com
title: MIA Representatives Participated in “The 4th Beijing Global Friend Airports CEO Forum”Travelandtourworld.com
text:
MIA Representatives Participated in “The 4th Beijing Global Friend Airports CEO Forum”
The Fourth Beijing Global Friend Airports CEO Forum took place in Beijing on 10th September 2015, with the topic of “Practical Cooperation, Innovative Development”. Representatives of Macau International Airport (MIA) Ms. Suning Liu – President of the Board of Directors of Administration of Airport Ltd. (ADA), Ms. Yuan Weifang – Chief Representative of Beijing Representative Office of Macau International Airport Company Limited (CAM), Mr. Frank Wu – Acting General Manager of Macau International Airport Security Company (SEMAC) and Mr. Paul Qiu – Director of Business & Marketing Department of Airport Information Management Solutions (AIMS) represented to attend “The 4th Beijing Global Friend Airports CEO Forum”.
During the opening ceremony, Ms. Cheng Hong – Deputy Mayor of Beijing, Mr. Zhou Laizhen – Deputy Administrator of Civil Aviation Administration of China (CAAC), Mr. Song Shengli – Party Secretary of Beijing Capital Land Ltd. and Mr. Boubacar Djibo – Director of Air Transport Bureau of International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) delivered speech and opened the forum jointly. The Forum brought together representatives from 20 international airports around the world, 17 domestic sister airports of Beijing Capital International Airport shared their development experience and highlights according to the topic of Opportunity and Challenge, Green Airport, Airport Commercialization and Airport Science, discussed the trend of development of the airport industry. Other 15 sister airports introduced their advanced experience and practice focus on Green Airport, Airport Commercialization and Airport Science.
The forum did not only strengthen the friendly interactive and exchanges and enhanced friendly relations between BCIA and other friend airports, but also helped to practice the “Practical Cooperation, Innovative Development” concept of this forum.
Other representatives of MIA: Ms. Karen Chan – Assistant of President of the Board of Directors of ADA and Ms. Song Yue – -Secretary of Beijing Representative Office of CAM.
Source:- Macau International Airport
